Comment:Audio Book Narration Macro for Audacity
Comment: (C) 2024 Brandon Parker
Comment: Version 1.1 - lite
Comment: Required Plug-Ins: None
Comment: Recording Assumption: MXL Cr24 mic, ZoomH4 Interface, Treated room
Save Project:
SelectTracks:Mode="Set" Track="0" TrackCount="1"
SetTrack:Color="Color3" Display="Waveform" Focused="1" Height="80" Mute="1" Name="Preserved Original" Selected="1" VZoom="Reset"
SelTrackStartToEnd:
Duplicate:
MuteAllTracks:
SelectTracks:Mode="Set" Track="0" TrackCount="1"
SelTrackStartToEnd:
Comment: Filter out inaudible low and high end energy...
High-passFilter:FREQUENCY="100" ROLLOFF="dB6"
Low-passFilter:FREQUENCY="22000" ROLLOFF="dB6"
Comment: Normalize to target RMS...
LoudnessNormalization:DualMono="1" LUFSLevel="-18" NormalizeTo="1" RMSLevel="-19" StereoIndependent="0"
Comment: Apply standard vocal boosting curve, further cutting sub-audible low end, gentle boost on foundation and air/clarity, gentle reduction in muddy frequencies...

Comment: Targeted static cut in sibalance trouble frequencies (may need to adjust these for other voice actors)
FilterCurve:f0="8594.8319" f1="9473.5367" f2="10352.242" FilterLength="8191" InterpolateLin="1" InterpolationMethod="B-spline" v0="-0.017192125" v1="-3.0343843" v2="-0.09169054"
Comment: Limit peak to ACX required -3dB...
LegacyLimiter:GAIN-L="0" GAIN-R="0" HOLD="10" MAKEUP="No" THRESH="-3" TYPE="SoftLimit"
SetTrack:Color="Color2" Display="Multiview" Focused="1" Height="160" Mute="0" Name="Mastered by Macro" Selected="1" Solo="1" VZoom="Reset"
Comment: Check our work and report...
Message:Text="RMS should be between -17 and -23."
Message:Text="While this version of the Macro does not check Peak RMS, the limiter should have done its job. However, you should ensure the noise floor is between -60 and -90."
MeasureRms:Use_Preset="<Current Settings>"
